long_desc.thetext:
> Not sure if it is related to > https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=439431
Sasi, please follow up. I can't reproduce this on master, BTW.

(In reply to comment #3) > Seems like my snippet is not enough to reproduce the error. > Here is the class, which should be enough. I removed as much code as possible > without removing the error. Try to clean the Project if the error is not > reproduced by this code directly. > Thanks for the complete snippet. I can confirm that this bug is a duplicate of bug 439431 which is already in 4.4.2. Hence this bug does not happen in 4.4.2 either. Will resolve this after adding a junit

Test released in master via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=c21920e168213fd0aca47b013f14cfc667141d9a and cherry picked on to 442 via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=R4_4_maintenance&id=efdfef52a74512cb9d9e26173c9e8b0f8c6645c7

Verified for Eclipse Luna SR2 Build id: M20150114-1500
